availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Newspaper and printing office in Frankfort, Kentucky. Aligned with the Democratic party. Publisher(s) and editor(s): James R. Adams and Edgar W. Robinson (1840), William Tanner (1841), William Tanner and Theodore O'Hara (1843-1850), S. McChesney and W. W. Stapp (1850-1852), Samuel I. M. Major, Jr. (1852-1886).

ab.bibl:
Carl E. Kramer and William B. Scott, Jr., Capital on the Kentucky (Frankfort, KY: Historic Frankfort, Inc., 1986), 143, 208.
Willard Rouse Jillson, The Newspapers and Periodicals of Frankfort, Kentucky 1795-1945 (Frankfort, KY: Kentucky State Historical Society, 1945), 16.
